nhc_headline: ...DEBBY JUST INLAND IN THE FLORIDA BIG BEND REGION... ...EXPECTED TO BRING MAJOR FLOODING OVER THE SOUTHEASTERN  UNITED STATES DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS...
summary:
...DEBBY JUST INLAND IN THE FLORIDA BIG BEND REGION... ...EXPECTED TO BRING MAJOR FLOODING OVER THE SOUTHEASTERN  UNITED STATES DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS...
 As of 8:00 AM EDT Mon Aug 5
 the center of Debby was located near 29.9, -83.4
 with movement NNE at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 979 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.
